Texts.Chs: 因为爆炸式减压或者过强的压力，你似乎即将面临死亡。迅速寻找庇护所是你此时首先要做的，否则你将死去。
Texts.Eng: Greetings! You appear to be rapidly dying due to explosive decompression or extreme pressure. You should seek safetly, and relatively quickly or face imminent death!

Texts.Chs:
警告！该星球表面辐射等级达到了非常危险的水平！
在没有合适的防护装置前不要试图进一步探索！
Texts.Eng:
WARNING! RADIATION LEVELS ON THIS PLANET ARE EXTREMELY HAZARDOUS!
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs:
警告！该星球表面温度非常高！
在没有合适的防护装置前不要试图进一步探索!
Texts.Eng:
WARNING! TEMPERATURE ON THIS PLANET IS DANGEROUSLY HIGH!
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs:
警告！该星球表面温度非常低！
在没有合适的防护装置前不要试图进一步探索!
Texts.Eng:
WARNING! TEMPERATURE ON THIS PLANET IS DANGEROUSLY LOW!
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!
